name: sass
description: CSS Preprocessor Sass Snippet .scss , .sass  >> Snippet >> sass by @code4mk
readme: # Sass snippet (.sass , .scss) Install: ```ssh apm install sass ``` Doc : [wiki page](https://github.com/code4mk/sass/wiki) Mian Features: - Sass Snippet Main Feature ❤️ | Name | snippet | |---|---| | .sass | ss- | | .scss | ss- | | function(.scss/.sass) | ssf- | Version: - Sass Another package which helps you ❤️ @code4mk ```ssh apm install atom-axios ``` ```ssh apm install atom-vue-router ``` ```ssh apm install atom-vue ``` --- [![code4k](https://img.shields.io/badge/Powered-By-blue.svg)]() ---
